metadata.description:
Take a taste of your favorite Skybound series in one quick download!  If you haven't tried one-- this is the book to read!  From the action romp Invincible, to the all-ages splendor of Super Dinosaur, Skybound provides you with the greatest stories out there!

Includes: INVINCIBLE #1, SUPER DINOSAUR #1, ASTOUNDING WOLF-MAN #1, TECH JACKET #1, BRIT #1, BATTLE POPE #1, and GUARDING THE GLOBE #1!
metadata.name: SDCC Skybound Sampler
